to share tech about this character on Twitter

column2:
Can perform Garuda Force moves at any time
during Heat.
column7:
Homing high heat engager to check oppents trying to 
 sidestep your other options.

column17:
hit the opponent with
certain moves to stock it

column7:
Mid heat engager with a lot of range. Very linear, so it's best 
 used after conditioning them not to sidestestep with b+3.

A safe but duckable high df+1 extension. Useful for whiff 
 punishment situations.

Jumping knee attack. It goes over lows and has great range 
 however it's unsafe on block. Useful to extend combos 
 as a heat dash move or punish situations.

Fast attack to check situations and start offense. 
 It has several extensions you can use for pressure.

Very long range mid you can use to poke and control the
 midrange. It also has several extensions you can use
 to apply pressure.

Similar application as the previously mentioned poke, but
 slower. Better used at close range.

column7:
Your low options to harass the opponent. Worth noting that 
 df+3 has a fake out in df+3,3 which can be used for pressure 
 especially in okizeme situations.

A powerful high launcher that can break through parries and 
 power crushes. On block, it allows you to continue pressure.

column12:
After db+4 or 3,1 you can Heat Burst and follow with
ws+2,[ 4~3 ],2 for damage and mininal Heat cost.

column7:
Safe mid counterhit launcher with a lot of range. Use it along 
 with b,f+4 to control the midrange space.

column12:
After tornado, you can use df+4,3 for mid wall carry and b+1 
or 3,1 for shorter distances.

column7:
Slow axe kick that can be used to pressure opponents at 
 close range. Very rewarding on counterhit.

column12: Use f+1+2 for wall break and d+1 to break the floor.

column7:
Running knee attack you can use to approach the opponent 
 and start your offense.

column2:
heat on uf+3~F
heat on ws+1,2~F
